column2: Indonesia targets increase in Freeport
column3: Newmont copper sales in 2014 JAKARTA
column4: March 28 Indonesia has approved an increase in sales for local units of copper miners Freeport McMoRan Copper & Gold Inc and Newmont Mining Corp
column5: which together produce 97 percent of the country's copper
column6: while the two firms await approval to resume exports.

column2: Chile AES Gener brings in fund as partner on Guacolda power plant SANTIAGO Chilean energy company AES Gener SA  said on Friday it was bringing in investment fund Global Infrastructure Partners (GIP) as a minority partner to run the Guacolda thermoelectric plant in the north of the Andean country.

column2: US Navy's Sikorsky helicopters cancellation would cost government $250 mln - Levin WASHINGTON
column3: March 27 The U.S. Navy's plan to cancel an order for 29 MH-60 Sikorsky helicopters under a current five-year agreement would trigger termination fees of at least $250 million and raise the cost of Army helicopters covered by the same contract
